titles.title: Changing How America Reduces Greenhouse Emissions (CHARGE) Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the technologies through which a vehicle qualifies for the credit for new qualified plug-in electric drive motor vehicles.
Changing How America Reduces Greenhouse Emissions (CHARGE) Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: Changing How America Reduces Greenhouse Emissions (CHARGE) Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the tax credit for new qualified plug-in electric drive motor vehicles to include vehicles that are powered by an alternative electrical energy storage device other than a battery.
